description.narrative: Georgia II - Vocational Education Project: The project aims to improve the link between market-demanded skills and the supply of Georgians with those technical skills.

title.narrative: Matching trainees' skills to market needs in Georgia

condition.narrative: III8. PIA Schedule 2 3. Prior to the initial Disbursement of Program Funding for any grant awarded under the Competitive Program Improvement Grants Activity, MCA-Georgia (or the relevant Implementing Entity) must have adopted an operations manual for this Activity satisfactory in form and substance to MCC, including environmental and social safeguards and provisions.
